insert.if: INSERT INTO complain (complain_no, complainer_id, defendant_id, community_no, complain_detail, complain_type, complain_kind, complain_date, complain_state) VALUES(seq_complain_no.nextval, #{complainerId}, #{defendantId}, #{communityNo}, #{complainDetail}, #{complainType}, 'BD', SYSDATE, 'N')

INSERT INTO complain (complain_no, complainer_id, defendant_id, meeting_no, complain_detail, complain_type, complain_kind, complain_date, complain_state) VALUES(seq_complain_no.nextval, #{complainerId}, #{defendantId}, #{meetingNo}, #{complainDetail}, #{complainType}, 'MT', SYSDATE, 'N')

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT complainer_id, complain_kind, complain_date, complain_state, complain_check_date FROM complain ORDER BY complain_no desc ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT complainer_id, complain_kind, complain_date, complain_state, complain_check_date FROM complain) countTable
